attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many older teachers are suffering from stress exhaustion, due to the stress of coping in today's schools. A number of causes for teachers' stress, including behaviour problems and the continuing rise in paperwork. Teachers, today, spend their lives watching their backs and justifying their existance.
